freenet.crypt
Class RijndaelPCFBMode

java.lang.Object
  freenet.crypt.PCFBMode
      freenet.crypt.RijndaelPCFBMode

public final class RijndaelPCFBMode
extends PCFBMode

Optimised PCFBMode for Rijndael. All this actually does is avoid two new int[4]'s per cycle.
